IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE EDUCATIONAL AND RELIGIOUS PROGRAMMING ON TELEVISION, PUBLICATIONS, NEWS MEDIA AND OTHER ELECTRONIC/PRINT COMMUNICATION SERVICES
IRS990.MissionDesc: UTILIZING POWERFUL TECHNOLOGY, WE STRIVE TO CONNECT PEOPLE OF FAITH THROUGH RELEVANT, INSPIRING AND PRAYERFUL PROGRAMMING WE ENDEAVOR TO TEACH THE WISDOM OF GOD IN THE CATHOLIC TRADITION AND MOVE PEOPLE OF ALL AGES AND FROM DIVERSE SITUATIONS TOWARD THE FULLNESS OF LIFE
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDED EDUCATIONAL AND RELIGIOUS PROGRAMMING ON TELEVISION.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: PROVIDED PUBLICATIONS/NEWS MEDIA TO THE ROMAN CATHOLIC COMMUNITY

THE ORGANIZATION HAS MADE NO CHANGES TO ITS OVERSIGHT PROCESS FOR SELECTION PROCESS DURING THE TAX YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINES 15A AND B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS RELIED UPON THE GUIDELINES PREPARED BY THE ARCHDIOCESE OF BOSTON, A RELATED PARTY, AND HAS ALSO COMPARED COMPENSATION WITH LIKE POSITIONS IN SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS FOR REASONABLENESS. COMPENSATION IS PART OF THE BUDGET PROCESS BY THE CEO AND SENIOR STAFF. THE BUDGET IS APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.
